title: The Archive
author: The Archive
content: Happy Day White PaperQuote from: https://bitcoinmagazine.com/culture/trammell-on-satoshi-bitcoin-white-paper-day“When I initially read the paper, the importance of the proof-of-work consensus mechanism didn’t really sink in, whereas today I’ve realized that proof-of-work consensus really is the innovation,” - Dustin Trammell.https://i.imgur.com/Yq3ZxBp.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/Y43tJRL.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/UwrlITS.jpg

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: The Archive on October 31, 2022, 07:07:47 AMHappy Day White PaperQuote from: https://bitcoinmagazine.com/culture/trammell-on-satoshi-bitcoin-white-paper-day“When I initially read the paper, the importance of the proof-of-work consensus mechanism didn’t really sink in, whereas today I’ve realized that proof-of-work consensus really is the innovation,” - Dustin Trammell.

comments.author: harapan
comments.body: Should be 14 years already since Satoshi published the first white paper I can not get the link to the original post here but it won't be bad idea if people start reading all over again since some haven't read or skimmed through a bit. It's a remarkable date after the published paper bitcoin has topped all other currencies in several condition's especially when other fiat currencies are getting devalued and low. Bitcoin still remains the king over other currencies

comments.author: The Archive
comments.body: Quote from: harapan on October 31, 2022, 11:31:52 PMBitcoin still remains the king over other currenciesApart from remaining king, Bitcoin is proof that the ridicule that was once addressed to Satoshi for his thoughts in seeing the future has turned into a valuable asset for them and all people.Sorry I fell asleep for a long time while enjoying the beauty of the dream if all countries would smile with Bitcoin behind the complexity of the banking system.
